about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me a little better!
about.text: My name is Zakaria, a 21-year-old passionate gamedeveloper. I always loved playing games and I have always wondered how they were made. I love studying, learning new skills and expanding my knowledge in general. After I graduate I want to continue studying and getting my bachelor in Robotics. I was inspired by one of the projects that I worked on and it changed my vision on how technology is able to improve the lives of people with diverse abilities.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's connect!
contact.text: Reach out via social media or email. Feel free to check out my github for all of my amazing projects!
